description.text:
“Hehe! Me and the Haregon Librarians go waaay back!
Every day I would go to his library and ring his $(b;summer)bell$()!
Until he would get so upset he would call security!
So funny – The little pixie wipes a way a tear of laughter -

We should hold up tradition!
But to make it more interesting, you should $(b;spring)ring$() it!
I dare you! 
Again! Do it Again!
Did you see how angry he got! His face was all red! If we went on a bit longer, I think some carrots would have popped out of his ears! Run! run!
